terms.title: User Agreement and Terms of Use
terms.title1: Welcome to our site! Please read our user agreement and terms of use carefully before using it.
terms.title3: This legal agreement (<Agreement>) is a document that sets forth the terms and conditions of use of our website (your website address) (hereinafter referred to as <Site>). By using our site, you fully agree to the terms and conditions of this Agreement.
terms.title5: We use your information to provide you with our services and products, to improve our services and products, to communicate with you about our services and products, to personalize your experience with our services and products, and to comply with our legal obligations.
terms.title6: With Whom We Share Your Information
terms.title7: We do not share your information with third parties except as required by law or to protect our rights or the rights of others.
terms.title9: We employ various security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, use, disclosure, alteration or destruction.
terms.title11: You have the right to access your information, correct it, delete it, restrict processing, object to processing, and transfer your information.
terms.title13: If you have any questions about our privacy policy, please contact us at our email address.
terms.title14: Thank you for the trust you place in us. We value your privacy and are committed to providing the highest level of privacy.
